alert.note: Alert for Caddo; Kiowa; Washita (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 12 at 5:44AM CDT until June 12 at 6:30AM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Washita County in western Oklahoma... Southwestern Caddo County in southwestern Oklahoma... Northeastern Kiowa County in southwestern Oklahoma... * Until 630 AM CDT. * At 544 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 5 miles southwest of Cloud Chief to 5 miles north of Roosevelt, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Carnegie, Mountain View, Fort Cobb, Gotebo, Cooperton, Fort Cobb Reservoir, Alfalfa, Albert, Cloud Chief, Boone, and Cowden. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
